tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It will be difficult to articulate how grateful I am to Dr. Kaushik Gandhi, but I will attempt to convey all the reasons why anyone can blindly trust his professional services. 

I had been suffering from persistent pain/ sensitivity due to formation of a cavity in one of my molars. The pain was so much that I was taking pain killers everyday and my day to day routines were impacted. I kept pushing the treatment because I thought ' If the cavity itself is causing so much pain, the treatment of the same ( Root Canal Treatment) would be a nightmare'.

However when the pain started getting out of hand, I came across Dr Kaushik on Practo. I believe I am very lucky that this happened.

I spoke with Dr Kaushik for 10 minutes over the call and that was enough for me to book a consultation. He reassured me that I will not feel any pain whatsoever and the entire treatment will be hassle free. And all of that was 100% true. 

Across my 3 sittings which included Consultation, Dental Cleaning, Root Canal, Temporary Cap & permanent cap fitting, these were the highlights:

* No waiting time: I did not have to wait for even 5 minutes before Dr Kaushik began his treatment 

* Hygiene: Dr Kaushik's entire team was clad in PPE suits and utmost importance was given to hygiene 

* Behaviour & Attitude: Dr Kaushik patiently explained the medical nuisances of the treatment and constantly updated me about the next steps. His nature & attitude was very comforting. 

* Quality of Equipment/ Products: All the products and equipment that was used during the treatment was of the highest possible standards- right from the temporary cap to the cements used to the numbing gels.

* No Pain: I will not be exaggerating when I say there was 'zero' pain throughout the treatment. After getting to know Dr Kaushik, I realized that he has spent years studying &Pain and methods to alleviate Discomfort'. 

* End Result: I now have a clean pair of teeth owing the deep cleaning done by Dr Kaushik. The persistent pain has gone. I feel like a huge weight has been lifted off my shoulders. 

I have now made it a point to visit Dr Kaushik on a regular basis because I have complete faith in him today. 

To anyone who is confused about where to go for dental problems, I will insist you spend only 5 minutes talking to him- I am sure you will not look anywhere else for dental treatments.

To conclude I want to mention one instance:

I often asked the doctor after various phases of the treatment - ' Is the procedure really done?'. This is because I could not believe how I could not feel even a pinch.

At 74 years old, my teeth were in very bad shape with worn out teeth, missing ones, crooked ones and overall, in poor condition.

I was aware that a major overhaul will be required for my teeth to be made presentable and for me to be able to smile in a confident manner.

Dr Gandhi was very encouraging and confident right from my first visit on what he can do and achieve for me.

He operates in a meticulously clean environment and makes use of all the latest technology available in his treatment plans.

Based on all this, I decided to go ahead with him for my treatment and I have no regrets.

He did a sterling job in reconstructing my teeth and was quite open with what he can achieve and what he cannot guarantee based upon his observations as well as the Xray and scan reports.

The results that he has achieved over a period of less than two months have been astounding, given the condition of my teeth before.

I noticed that he was passionate and very meticulous in his approach to get the job done to the patient's satisfaction.

I would gladly recommend him for anyone needing advanced dental treatment.
reply_text:
Dear Mr. Mahadevan !! 
Thank you so much for your kind words and your review . We value your relationship and truly appreciate. It means a lot to us and go on doing good , better and best . 
Wish you all the very best for happy and healthy life a head

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had a cavity in my wisdom tooth and was asked to go to a dentist. However, I feared going to a dentist and had been pushing off my visit for nearly a year. I wish I hadn‚Äôt. Dr. Kaushik Gandhi was recommended by one of my friend. Mr. Gandhi is a dentist to my friend and his entire circle of friends and their families. I now know why. Dr. Kaushik Gandhi, once you see him at work, will not go to anyone else for any of your dental problems. He is not the one to recommend a root canal when one can save the tooth. He will give you the correct advise. He will give you ample time and will not hurry things up. The best way to assess a dentist is the way your teeth feel after the cleaning or extraction. After my tooth extraction and cleaning, I did not experience any sensitivity or any pain. I would recommend him to anyone who is looking for a trustworthy dentist. If you go to him, you teeth are in the right hands.  Staff of Dr. Gandhi is well trained and cordial. I found the clinic and the equipment used to be extremely clean and hygienic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I am grateful to Doctor Gandhi for his genuine guidance .
Dr Gandhi is not only a great dentist with plethora of experience but also a wonderful human being. He guided me regarding complicated dental issue which my 10 year old son was undergoing from past few years.
He took  care of everything right from correct diagnosis, recommending relevant tests & even considering a second opinion. He didn‚Äôt rush into providing an instant solution but carefully analysed everything before coming to a conclusion. Dr Gandhi has successfully completed the surgery & has also recommended orthodontist for future treatment. Thank you Sir üôè

I have known Dr Kaushik since I was a kid. He did fillings for all my four molars when I was about 10 years old (now I am 35).  His treatment was way advanced for the time then, and nothing has changed now! He keeps abreast with the research and upgrading his knowledge in the field of DENTAL CARE  and brings it to his patients with cutting edge technologies. 

I booked my appointment without a blink as for 25 years  I never had to revisit him or anyone else for the fillings in these years as the job was done perfectly!  This time too the experience was noting short of magical. A painless root canal! I was dreading it as i had heard stories about bitter experiences from friends on how painful it could be. 

The best thing is there's no waiting time whatsoever as that's a policy he wouches by. He is highly experienced and skilled with a an awesome team of two assistants and his lovely wife who looked over my two kids which I was getting treated. The clinic is immaculately maintained, and he uses premium products.

 He explained the whole process with pros and cons to help me take an informed decision on which type of tooth cap I should choose. 

Being a perfectionist at his job, he will do whatever it takes to ensure you get the best! My tooth being small was difficult to scan for an x- ray, but he wouldn't stop retaking x rays until he was convinced.  Moreover he measured my tooth digitally for precession. It was so quick and smooth 
 Also he completed the procedure in just three sittings.

I highly recommend him for all your dental care needs. Thank you doctor for this wonderful experience.

Pooja Pai

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a RCT (root canal Treatment) dated 11-april-2023, based on my experience...

TLDR; if you need painless RCT,
if you wanna carry out rest of your life without worrying about your tooth pain,
if you want to have your teeth treated by most experienced Dental Specialist....Trust Dr. Kaushik Blindfold.

1st Appointment - Dr Kaushik Gandhi is most experienced Dental Specialist I ever came accross, 
He did full assessment of my current conditions of teeth, suggested me for RCT, gave me a reasonable estimation.

2nd Appointment - Did RCT in 40-45 mins, and its done, it was that simple 
Done everything in 2 appointments. 

I gonna have Wisdom tooth removal in few weeks, and yes there is no negative comments for a reason.
Which makes sense if you go through his Experience & Academics.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
After having been to 4 different (and very experienced) dentists for one errant tooth, I finally came to Dr Gandhi! And I can only thank my stars for this!

There was a collective mess in most of my teeth and each tooth required a lot of work and had multiple complications. Dr Gandhi's approach is clinical, focused and very very patient friendly. He uses sophisticated and advanced equipments and very high quality consumables. He planned my treatment in advance and explained everything in detail. Each and every single one of my appointments were smooth, absolutely pain free and pleasant. There was no wait time. 

Special mention to Parul ma'am and Mahesh and Anant with Dr Gandhi. Collectively, I actually looked forward to come for my dental appointments! They all became friends!

It's liberating to eat and chew normally - something that I had forgotten in the last few years! Huge Thanks to Doc for bringing normalcy back to my life!!

Thank you Sir!

I have to come to Dr Gandhi for treatment all the way from America. I was looking for a doctor who could solve all my dental issues in one go as I can barely afford the time and resources to keep coming to India again for dental treatment. I must say I was very happy with Dr. Gandhi‚Äôs diagnosis of the problems and his clear understanding and action plan to resolve all my issues in a set time frame.  His confidence is admirable and inspires the same in us patients. I can be a difficult patient but Dr Gandhi patiently went through my many questions and made sure I was always assured and satisfied. Dr Gandhi is a very skilled doctor with many years of experiance and expertise. I can confidently say that I am happy with the treatment and my new set of teeth and lovely smile. I will recommend Dr Kaushikbhai to all my near and dear ones as the dentist of choice in Mumbai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting Dr.Gandhi since 2011-12 and he is just excellent in what he does. I had nothing but great experiences while going to see him. His team is great and he does an amazing job explaining everything that he does and listens to what I have to say. All his equipments are state of the art and maintains highest standards of cleanliness and hygiene. He keeps me calm during all of my appointments and answers all of my questions. After seeing many different dentists I can say that Dr. Gandhi and his team are the best. I will continue to go there and would highly recommend him to anyone.
